long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
All -In-One download & convert images to and from any format, including Background Images!

üí´ Key Features:

The extension offers a variety of conversion methods based on your specific needs:

‚úÖ Now supports background images!
‚úÖ Right-Click Convenience: Adds "Save image as..." to the right-click context menu.
‚úÖ Enhanced compatibility: ensure your images work efficiently across all browsers and editors.
‚úÖ Reverse Conversion.
‚úÖ Quality Control: Set target quality for JPG files to create images with high quality or reduced file sizes.
‚úÖ Boosted Productivity: Simplify png image conversion to enhance your workflow and improve the image quality.

‚Ü™Ô∏è All-Inclusive Conversion Options:

‚úÖ Right-Click Conversion:
Right-click on any image. Select "Save image as..." from the context menu. The extension will help you convert and download the image to PNG, JPG or WebP

‚úÖ Ensure Convert Images by Preserving Privacy:
Privacy matters, and we take it seriously! You will notice that all conversions happen locally on your computer when you upload the image ( without sending them to external servers).

‚úÖ Broad Utility: 
The extension isn't limited to one conversion type. You can use it to convert:
‚úì webp to png
‚úì jpg to png
‚úì png to jpg
‚úì jpeg to png
‚úì png to jpeg


‚úÖ Compatibility everywhere: 

Make your pictures compatible with all browsers and image editors. Since it is universally compatible, you won't face the risk of dealing with unsupported formats. It helps to make your visuals accessible to a broad audience.


üîë Easy Right-Click Transformation:

There are several reasons to make the switch:

‚òëÔ∏è Lack of Wider Usage: PNG image format is a more universally recognized format than webp.
‚òëÔ∏è Upload and download your desired file type including png images, in a second.
‚òëÔ∏è Limited Tool Availability: Limited tools are available for working with webp files.
‚òëÔ∏è Lack of Browser Support: Not every browser is compatible with web images.

üîõ How to Install
Here's how to install "Save As Image Converter" extension:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Click the "Add to Chrome" button (located on the right side above the text).
2Ô∏è‚É£ Confirm the installation by clicking "Add extension" in the pop-up.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Wait a few minutes for the extension to download and install.
4Ô∏è‚É£ That's all! Spot the icon in your Chrome toolbar.
